title: Experienced Editorial Outreach Specialist
description:
Now Hiring: Experienced Editorial Outreach Specialist

Remote Position | Long-Term Opportunity

Are you an experienced, detail-oriented writer with a strong commitment to producing measurable media results? Are you seeking a stable remote role with long-term growth potential—one that rewards high-quality, publication-ready content and the ability to build strong journalist relationships?

SimplyMedia is seeking a highly skilled Remote Editorial Outreach Specialist to join our expanding team. We are looking for a professional who understands editorial standards and can consistently deliver fast, compelling, and quotable pitches in response to media queries (HARO, Featured, etc.) while cultivating positive journalist relationships.

A writing background and portfolio/sample submissions are required.



What You’ll Receive

* Starting Pay: $450 per month

* Performance Bonuses: Top-performing specialists can advance from $450 to up to $1,000 per month in under six months by meeting our quality and speed KPIs (details provided upon hire).

* Paid Holidays (Philippine Official Holidays) & Paid Time Off: Available after regularization based on consistent, excellent performance.

* Targeted Training Provided: We will train you in our outreach tools and strategies; you must bring the foundational writing ability.

* Annual Bonuses for high-performing tea
mbers.



Who We’re Looking For

* Non-Negotiable: Proven writing experience (1+ years preferred) with the ability to submit a portfolio or relevant writing samples (e.g., media pitches, articles, marketing copy).

* Exceptional Writing Ability: Superb command of written English, strong grammar, and excellent editorial judgment. All outputs must be publication-ready.

* Relationship-Oriented Professional: Experience communicating politely and professionally, with the ability to build long-term rapport with journalists.

* Strategic Thinker: Understanding of media relations, PR strategy, or SEO link building is a significant advantage. You should know how to pitch a compelling angle—not just promote a company.

* Fast, Focused, and Reliable: Ability to respond quickly and deliver high-quality content under tight deadlines (e.g., targeting submission within the first 50 responses).



Key Responsibilities

As a Remote Editorial Outreach Specialist, your primary focus will be generating media coverage through expert communication and strong relationship management:

* Craft Quotable Pitches: Write clear, concise, expert-level responses with strong soundbites and quotable insights reporters can use immediately.

* Strategic Outreach & Follow-Up: Manage query platforms (HARO, Featured, etc.), ensuring fast submissions and timely, professional follow-ups to build journalist relationships.

* Communication Management: Organize, research, and respond to media correspondence with clarity, professionalism, and a focus on maintaining positive rapport.

This is a long-term, fully remote position focused on content quality, measurable media outcomes, and professional relationship building.?Regularization to permanent status is based on consistently excellent performance.



If You’re a Dependable, Skilled Writer Who Thrives Under Pressure—We Want to Hear from You

Multiple positions available. 



Leave us a message first, then apply here:

As a Project Coordinator, you’ll play a vital role in supporting our B2C customers, helping individuals access high-quality translations for personal documents, applications, and life events. This role combines customer service and project management: you’ll guide customers through their request, clarify requirements, prepare quotes, and coordinate the translation process end-to-end. Your daily activities will involve intricate collaboration with clients, translators, and our internal Production team to facilitate seamless translation projects.



This role is fast-paced. You’ll handle a high volume of small, quick-turnaround projects, responding to customer enquiries, preparing quotes, and ensuring each job is delivered accurately and on time. You will leverage your meticulous coordination and communication skills to manage project resources, maintain excellent client relationships, and ensure our operational and financial systems are up-to-date and accurate.





Key Responsibilities

• Respond to online chat enquiries, phone calls, and
s in a timely and helpful manner, ensuring that all client requests are acknowledged and actioned efficiently.

• Provide an exceptional level of customer service by being prompt, professional, and courteous in all client interactions.

• Prepare quotes, process payments, and clarify any missing information needed to begin the job.

• Manage a high volume of small translation jobs, each with short turnaround times and precise requirements.

• End to end project coordination of translation projects, including managing project scope, deadlines, resource assignments and project budgets.

• Coordinate with translators and other vendors ensuring that they have all the necessary information and resources to complete assignments.

• Continually monitor project progress, making adjustments as necessary to ensure project completion within timelines and budgets.

• Manage most project types reasonably autonomously.

• Ensure compliance with industry standards - ISO-17100 and ISO-18587.

• Support the quality management process, including proofreading documents and reviewing video synchronization.

• Use appropriate tools and systems to analyse files and prepare them for translation, and to convert and publish translated files.

• Participate in daily, weekly and monthly meetings with the Production team, to ensure that projects are being effectively managed.

• Develop and maintain business relationships with assigned clients and ensure that their experience with is world-class.

• Input data accurately and in a timely fashion into our operational & financial systems.

• Escalate any issues or roadblocks in a timely manner to the relevant stakeholders or management.

• Proactively communicate with clients to provide updates, confirm requirements, and clarify queries to ensure accuracy and satisfaction.

• Work regular weekend and evening (AU-time) hours.





Desired Skills & Qualifications

• At least 1–2 years of experience working in the translation and localisation industry

• Operations or project coordination experience

• Strong communication skills and excellent grasp of the English language, both written and spoken

• Excellent phone,
 and instant messaging communication skills, with a focus on providing prompt, professional and friendly client service

• High responsiveness to client enquiries across online chat, phone, and
 channels

• Excellent time management skills and the ability to work autonomously as well as collaboratively within a small team

• Exceptional interpersonal skills, capable of working effectively with different personalities and stakeholders

• Attention to detail and a well-organised, detail-oriented approach to managing tasks and projects

• An understanding, appreciation and passion for cultural diversity

• Familiarity with current technologies such as desktop sharing, cloud services and VoIP

• Knowledge of online calendars and scheduling tools (e.g. Google Calendar)

• High proficiency with Google Suite applications and Microsoft Office

• An ability to learn and grow quickly

• Alignment with our core values

description:
About Dreambound Inc.



Dreambound Inc. is a platform dedicated to facilitating upward mobility in America. This is a full-time role (40 hours per week). Please use the code DreamTeam when applying through the link below.

- Go-to-market, lead generation, and business development

You're a Strong Fit If You...

- Have experience in integrating AI into workflows involving operations, engineering, product, marketing, data, or other related skills



Nice to Haves

, Zapier, Slack, N8n, or similar

description:
Are passionate about Video Editing and all things Social? Come join our amazing team of creators at one of Australians premiere real estate brand!



Job Overview: 

We are seeking a high-speed, high-quality Video Editor to join our premier Australian real estate team at Ray White Erskineville. You will be a core part of our in-house marketing team, producing cinematic property films and high energy social media content (Reels/TikToks). You can find examples of our work here:

Youtube - 

Instagram - 



Your daily responsibilities include: 

- Property Film Editing: Transform raw footage into polished, professional walkthroughs.

- Social Media Content: Cut trendy, fast-paced vertical videos for Instagram and TikTok.

- Colour Grading: Manage LOG footage to ensure a premium, consistent brand aesthetic.

- Pipeline Management: Ensure all property videos are delivered within our 2 business day (48h) turnaround period.

- Quality Control: Maintain a high level of detail to ensure all videos meet Ray White brand guidelines.





Required Technical Skills & Experience: 

- Experience: 1–3 years in video editing (Real Estate or Social Media experience preferred).

- Software: Proficiency in Final Cut Pro (preferred), DaVinci Resolve, or Adobe Premiere.

- Technical Mastery: Demonstrated ability in colour grading, beat cutting, masking, and use of SFX/VFX.

- Hardware: Must own a professional setup capable of handling 4K footage (Mac preferred).

- Connectivity: A stable, high-speed internet connection for large file transfers.





Soft Skills: 

- Attention to Detail: Maintaining high quality under tight deadlines.

- Creative Eye: Ability to think "outside the box" to create engaging content.

- Communication: Conversational English skills for seamless team collaboration.





Work Schedule: 

- This is a full-time (contracted) position.

- Hours: 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM AEST (Sydney Time).

- Reliability: You must be comfortable working strictly during Australian business hours.



Perks and Benefits (What We Offer)

We believe in rewarding our team and providing a stable, high performance environment, including:

 - Consistent Full-Time Work: No more chasing freelance gigs; join a stable, high-performing team of creative professionals.

 - Modern Workflow: Work with the best creative tools, including 
, MotionVFX, and ClickUp, in an organised,   streamlined environment.

 - Creative & Career Growth: Ongoing training and the opportunity to learn from highly skilled creatives who are always looking to push the boundaries of real estate and social content.

 - Supportive Culture: A friendly, energetic, and dynamic workplace within a well-respected real estate company.

- Leave Credits: You will qualify for vacation and sick leaves after the initial 6-month probation period.



Salary: 

P32,200 starting (to be discussed based on experience).



How to Apply: To make sifting through applications easier, please use the subject heading: "Ray White Video Editor Application".



Please submit the following:

- Your resume.

- A link to your portfolio or showreel showcasing property or social media work. 

- An English proficiency score/test result. (If available)



The Recruitment Process: Shortlisted candidates will be invited to complete a Paid Test Edit of a property video with a 48-hour turnaround.

title: Web Developer (Part-Time, Remote – Pacific Time Overlap Required)
description:
We’re a U.S.-based marketing agency working heavily in the insurance and insurtech space. We’re looking for a reliable, detail-oriented web developer to support ongoing website builds, updates, integrations, and technical troubleshooting.

This is a part-time contract role. Some weeks may be light. Other weeks may be full. We assign work through tickets and communicate closely during Pacific Time business hours.



We are looking for someone we can work with directly long-term.



What You’ll Actually Be Doing

Most of the work will involve:

• WordPress builds, edits, and plugin modifications

• Creating or modifying custom functionality (ACF, hooks, filters, custom post types)

• Debugging issues (PHP errors, database queries, API failures)

• API integrations and maintenance

• Occasional Webflow adjustments

• Technical SEO audits and site performance improvements

• QA and browser testing before launch

This is hands-on implementation work, not just page building.



Core Technical Requirements

You should be strong in:

• PHP (clean, readable, maintainable code)

• WordPress development (themes, plugins, ACF)

• AWS

• Oracle

• MySQL troubleshooting

• Vanilla JS / jQuery

• HTML / CSS

• Debugging production issues using logs



Nice to have:

• Webflow experience

• Experience building custom WordPress plugins from scratch

• Video creation & editing experience



How We Build

We value clean architecture and maintainable code over quick fixes.

We care about writing code that the next developer can understand six months from now.



We expect:

• Thoughtful implementation, not patchwork solutions

• Clear naming conventions and organized structure

• Proper testing before marking work complete

• Asking clarifying questions before building



What We Care About (Beyond Code)

• You read tickets carefully and don’t skip details.

• You test your work before marking complete.

• You communicate clearly in written English.

• You are comfortable working with an American team during Pacific Time hours.

We value reliability and thoughtful execution over speed.



Availability

• Must overlap at least 2 hours per day with Pacific Time.

• This is part-time contract work.

• You will track your time while working on tickets.



To Apply, Please Include:

1. Examples of WordPress projects you’ve built (especially custom functionality).

2. Any plugins you’ve created or modified.

3. Your resume.

4. Your daily availability in Pacific Time.

5. Your hourly rate.

6. When you can start.

title: Looking to Speak with VA Agency Owners ($10 / hr)
description:
Hi, I’m looking to speak with virtual assistant agency owners for research.



I’m working on an early stage platform idea built specifically to help VA agencies manage their teams and operations better. Before I go deeper into it, I want honest feedback from people actually running agencies.



If you own or operate a VA agency with 5+ VAs, I’ll pay $10 for a 30-60 minute call to learn how you currently manage hours, team oversight, and client work behind the scenes.



This is not a sales call. I’m not pitching anything. I’m just validating whether the problems I’ve experienced are common across other agencies.



If you’re open to it, send me a message and tell me a bit about your agency size.



Thanks.

title: Process & Workflow Specialist
description:
At Get Scaled, we’re more than a consulting firm; we’re a catalyst for transformation. Built by business owners for business owners, we empower small businesses to become great companies through consulting, accelerator programs, and accessible education. If you are a T.E.A.M player, we want you.



Who We Are



We are Get Scaled, a boutique consulting firm built by entrepreneurs, for entrepreneurs. Our passion lies in empowering small business owners to build the companies of their dreams.



Our Purpose



We transform small businesses into great companies.



Our Mission



Get Scaled is on a mission to bridge the gap between small businesses and corporate companies.



Our Values



T – Tenacity and Trust



We don’t stop. We will keep looking for the answers and solutions until we crack the problem. And we earn trust through making mistakes, learning from them and educating on them to help others avoid them.



E – Education and Excellence



We keep learning and leave egos at the door. We identify bottlenecks, weaknesses and areas that we want to improve, find the best and upskill. We aim for excellence in our own standards, delivery and results.



A – Ambition and Allegiance



We have big goals, and aren’t afraid to go after them. And our clients are the same. And we remain loyal to our clients, our team and stick it out until we get the result.



M – Management and Meaning



We take full ownership and execute tasks, end to end. Whatever is in our area of responsibility, we make sure it gets seen through to the result. We are building a community of strategists, to equip all business owners with the education, tools and resources to build the companies of their dreams.



Our Business Model



Consulting and Implementation Services (Done For You)

Accelerator Programs (Done With You)

Content and Education (Self-Paced)





Location: Remote

Employment Type: Full-Time | Morning Shift



Position Summary 



We are seeking a detail-oriented and confident Process and Workflow Specialist to join our team. This role is ideal for someone who excels in client-facing environments, has a strong grasp of process documentation, and can collaborate cross-functionally to meet project deadlines. The successful candidate will be instrumental in developing and maintaining clear, actionable Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) and process workflows for both internal teams and clients. 



Responsibilities :



Client-Facing Tasks 

- Conducts online meetings with clients to gather initial requirements for SOPs and workflows. 

- Provides updates on project progress and resolves client enquiries and technical issues during meetings. 

- Collaborates with clients to ensure documentation aligns with their operational needs. 

- Submits Quality Assurance (QA) tasks to Project Manager for SOPs and Workflows ensuring proper structures are followed prior sending it to the client for approval. 

- Reports to the Project Manager for enquiries, weekly wins and encountered bottlenecks. 



 

Internal Tasks 

- Develops comprehensive SOPs for internal operations and client-facing processes. 

- Creates and maintains process workflows using visual collaboration tools. 

- Works cross-functionally to ensure client deliverables are met on time. 

- Support internal teams with documentation that enhances clarity and efficiency. 

- Reports to the Operations Manager for enquiries, weekly wins and encountered bottlenecks. 



Requirements  



General Requirements 

- Proven experience conducting online client meetings for SOP and workflow gathering. 

- Strong communication skills with the ability to confidently address client concerns. 

- Experience in developing SOPs and process workflows for both internal and external use. 

- Demonstrated ability to collaborate across departments to meet project deadlines. 

- Willingness to explore and/or learn client provided software or application to align with their process and  

- Flexible and resilient under pressure. 



Technical Requirements 

- Proficient in Miro and L
 workflow visualisation. 

- Familiarity with AI tools such as ChatGPT, Gemini, etc., to enhance productivity. 

- Proficient in using Project Management tools like Asana. 



Benefits 

- Growth Program: Access to mentoring sessions led by tenured experts within the company. 

- Technical Skill Upgrade: Exposure to a variety of client software and platforms. 

 - Work-Life Balance: Observance of Australian public holidays and paid time for virtual games across departments. 

- Schedule: Morning shift to support optimal productivity and collaboration.

title: Account Executive
description:
ABOUT THE JOB

Are you a relationship builder who knows how to grow accounts and prevent churn? Penji is looking for an Account Executive to own customer relationships from onboarding through expansion. You'll manage a portfolio of accounts, conducting regular strategy calls, identifying upgrade opportunities, and ensuring customers get maximum value from their subscriptions. This role blends customer success with revenue generation—you'll need to balance support, strategic thinking, and sales skills. If you're motivated by customer wins and hitting revenue targets, apply to join Penji today.



ABOUT THE COMPANY

Since 2017, Penji has provided on-demand access to the top 2% of graphic designers. We're the leader in graphic design subscription services and have been recognized by Inc. Magazine as one of the fastest-growing companies. 

Beyond our business success, we're a community-conscious startup dedicated to supporting nonprofits and those helping others. Graphic design is what we do. Being a responsible employer and supporting our communities is who we aim to be. Join us on our mission to leave a positive footprint.



QUALIFICATIONS

? 5+ years of customer service/support experience

? 3+ years building and managing high-performing customer support teams in the B2B environment

? Experience up-selling and cross-selling

? Excellent written and verbal communication skills

? Creative problem-solving abilities

? Impeccable organization and accurate note-taking

? Hands-on and willing to execute strategies



RESPONSIBILITIES

? Account Management: Serve as primary contact for assigned customers, guiding them through their journey from onboarding to upgrade opportunities.

? Proactive Outreach: Schedule and conduct regular check-in calls with customers to deepen relationships, understand evolving needs, and identify growth opportunities.

? Customer Success: Monitor account health, usage patterns, and satisfaction levels to ensure customers achieve their goals with Penji.

? Upgrade Strategy: Identify and present upsell & cross-sell opportunities based on customer needs and patterns.

? Churn Prevention: Proactively identify at-risk accounts, address concerns before escalation, and manage retention conversations.

? Support & Problem-Solving: Handle customer inquiries through tickets,
, and chat. Troubleshoot issues and coordinate with internal teams for quick resolution.

? Proposals & Presentations: Prepare & present upgrade proposals provide value & align w/ customer objectives.

? Communication Management: Maintain timely, professional communication across all channels including
, calls, chat, and video conferences.

? Documentation: Maintain accurate records of customer interactions, account status, and communication history.

? Reporting: Create regular reports on account performance, upgrade opportunities, customer feedback, and revenue generation.

? Cross-Team Collaboration: Work with designers, project managers, and support teams to ensure seamless project execution and customer satisfaction.

? Process Improvement: Develop and test strategies to improve customer experience, account growth, and operational efficiency.

? Continuous Learning: Stay updated on product features, sales techniques, and customer success strategies to maximize account value.

title: Shopify Store Creator
description:
I’m looking for an experienced Shopify developer/designer to create a clean, professional Shopify storefront for a digital products brand in the personal finance niche.



The store will sell digital products such as:



* Financial planning eBooks

* Budgeting templates

* Personal finance guides

* Digital bundles

* E-books and financial investing templates 



The goal is to create a simple but polished storefront that looks trustworthy, modern, and fully compliant with Shopify standards.



This is a one-time setup project, but if the work is great, there may be future projects and ongoing work.



Scope of Work:



You will be responsible for:



Store Setup



* Create a complete Shopify store from scratch

* Set up a clean, professional theme (minimal, modern design)

* Optimize layout for conversions and mobile responsiveness



Product Setup



* Upload and organize digital products (eBooks, templates, bundles)

* Set up digital delivery (via Shopify Digital Downloads or similar app)

* Create clean product pages with proper formatting

*Create AI images of the products for the store 



Payment & Checkout



* Configure standard Shopify payments

* Ensure the store structure is compatible with BNPL integrations (Affirm/Klarna)



Pages & Legal



Create essential pages:



  * Home

  * About

  * Contact

  * FAQ



Set up legal pages:



  * Privacy Policy

  * Terms & Conditions

  * Refund Policy

  * Disclaimer

*Branding



* Clean, trustworthy design (finance/personal development style)

* Professional fonts, colors, and layout

* Make the store look legitimate and polished





Requirements:



* Proven experience building Shopify stores

* Experience with digital product stores (preferred)

* Understanding of Shopify policies and best practices

* Strong design sense (clean, modern, professional)

* Ability to complete the project quickly and communicate clearly





Bonus (Not Required):



* Experience with Klarna or Affirm compatibility

* Experience in finance, education, or digital product brands (credit and financial planning) 

* Conversion-focused design experience



What I’m Looking For:



* Simple but high-quality work

* Fast turnaround

* Attention to detail

* Someone reliable for potential long-term collaboration



To Apply:

Please include:



1. Links to Shopify stores you’ve built

2. Resume 

3. Short intro video

title: TikTok Shop Expert (Dropshipping)
description:
We are a fast-growing e-commerce and marketing company that specializes in building and scaling high-performance dropshipping stores for our clients. Our mission is to identify winning products, create optimized storefronts, and implement automated systems that drive consistent sales and profitability.



We are seeking a Dropshipping Expert who can leverage product research, supplier networks, automation tools, and data-driven marketing to launch and scale multiple dropshipping stores efficiently.



Responsibilities

Product Research & Store Listing



Identify trending, high-converting products suitable for dropshipping across niches.



Source reliable suppliers and ensure competitive pricing and fulfillment quality.



Create and optimize compelling product pages with persuasive copy, pricing strategy, and visuals.



Automation & Fulfillment Management



Implement and manage dropshipping automation tools and integrations.



Ensure seamless order processing, supplier sync, inventory updates, and tracking.



Maintain smooth customer communication and post-purchase workflows.



Store Scaling & Optimization



Develop strategies to increase traffic, conversions, and average order value.



Optimize pricing, bundles, upsells, and promotional offers to maximize margins.



A/B test product pages, creatives, and campaigns for performance improvement.



Performance Monitoring & Reporting



Track KPIs including sales, ROI, CPA, CTR, and conversion rates.



Provide weekly performance reports and actionable growth insights.



Identify winning products and scale opportunities across stores.



Collaboration



Work with marketing and creative teams to align product strategy with ad campaigns.



Ensure stores meet platform compliance and supplier standards.



Support internal teams and clients with dropshipping best practices.



Requirements



Proven experience managing dropshipping stores (Shopify, TikTok Shop, Amazon, or similar).



Strong knowledge of product research methods, supplier sourcing, and fulfillment workflows.



Experience with dropshipping automation tools and e-commerce integrations.



Understanding of paid traffic and conversion optimization for e-commerce.



Analytical mindset with ability to interpret sales and traffic data.



Creative ability to position products and offers effectively.



Strong communication and organizational skills.

title: Virtual Assistant for an M&A company
description:
Company Overview:



We are an expanding healthcare M&A company in search of an efficient and reliable Virtual Assistant. If you are an organized, detail-oriented, and proactive individual, who can effectively juggle multiple tasks and schedules in a fast-paced environment, then you are the perfect fit for our team.



Job Responsibilities:



1. Manage our acquisition targets and maintain an updated CRM. Ensure that all received documents are well organized and acquisition targets are consistently followed up on to prevent any opportunity from slipping through the cracks.



2. Regularly reach out to business listings that meet our criteria on BizBuySell each week and convert them into prospects by coordinating effective follow-up strategies.



3. Arrange meetings between the owner and acquisition targets and potential financiers for the acquisitions.



4. Source new banks and financing partners, schedule and manage appointments for the owner to meet with them.



5. Assist the owner in scheduling his weekly tasks, ensuring he stays ahead of them without falling behind.



6. Maintain organization and consistent communication to excel in this role.





Qualifications:



1. Excellent written and verbal English communication skills.



2.  Highly organized personality and skills.



3. Ability to multi-task, prioritize work, and manage time effectively.



4. Self-motivated and proactive with a positive attitude.



5. Willingness to learn skills that may be needed for the role



6. High-speed, reliable internet connection



Preferred:



7. At least 2 years of experience as a Virtual Assistant or in a similar role, preferably within the healthcare or M&A industry.



8. Proficient in CRM platforms(hubspot) and MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), and Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Slides). Proficient in scheduling software of your choice. 





If you are interested in this position and meet the above criteria, please submit your resume,  a brief description of why you believe you would be a good fit for this role, and a short video of you telling us why you are the best and what sets you apart from the others. You must submit a video and you must have the subject line of your application include the phrase: "Your problems are over".



About us:



Our company is dedicated to the growth and development of our employees. We believe in fostering a work environment that encourages learning, growth, and the opportunity to reach their full potential. As our business continues to grow there will be many opportunities for advancement for the right candidate.



We are an equal-opportunity employer and welcome all qualified candidates' applications.

title: E-Commerce Inventory & Purchasing Manager (Zoho Inventory )
description:
We are a fast-growing international e-commerce company looking for a highly organized and analytical Inventory & Purchasing Manager to manage stock forecasting & reordering.



You will be responsible for monitoring our inventory levels inside Zoho Inventory, identifying fast-moving products, preventing stockouts, and coordinating reorders with our CEO. 



This is not a basic VA role. We are looking for someone who understands inventory logic, stock forecasting, and purchasing strategy, please do not apply without relevant experience to avoid wasting time. 



Your Main Responsibilities



• Monitor inventory levels inside Zoho Inventory

• Identify fast-moving SKUs based on last 30–60 days sales

• Calculate stock cover (days remaining)

• Set and maintain reorder points

• Prepare purchase orders for supplier approval

• Track shipments (air vs sea)

• Ensure no stockouts on top-selling products

• Help reduce overstock and dead inventory

• Maintain clean inventory data



What We Are Looking For



You MUST have:



• Experience managing inventory for an e-commerce business

• Experience using Zoho Inventory

• Strong understanding of:



Reorder points



Lead times



Safety stock



Stock forecasting



Inventory turnover

• Strong Excel or Google Sheets skills

• Excellent written English

• High attention to detail

• Ability to work independently and proactively



Bonus if you have:

• Experience with WooCommerce

• Experience with stocked inventory models

title: Expert Google & Microsoft Ads Specialist (B2B Lead Gen / IT Niche)
description:
We are launching a specialized M365 Emergency Response service in a GERMAN speaking country. We help businesses solve critical IT issues (Exchange down, hacked tenants, configuration failures) immediately.



I am NOT looking for a generalist who does E-Commerce or Dropshipping. I need a Search Intent Strategist who understands the B2B IT sector and knows how to capture high-intent "emergency" clicks while filtering out low-value traffic.



Responsibilities

Campaign Setup: Build and manage search campaigns on Google Ads and Microsoft (Bing) Ads.



B2B Filtering: Implement aggressive negative keyword lists to exclude "free", "home", "student", and "personal" users.



Conversion Tracking: Set up and monitor GTM (Google Tag Manager) and GA4 to track calls and form submissions.



Ad Copywriting: Write compelling, professional ad copy that speaks to IT Managers and Business Owners in distress.



Landing Page Audit: Provide feedback on our landing page to ensure maximum conversion rates for emergency leads.



Requirements (The "Must-Haves")

Proven B2B Experience: You have managed Ads for IT services, MSPs, or SaaS before.



Master of Match Types: You know why "Broad Match" is a budget killer for this niche and prefer "Exact" and "Phrase" match.



Microsoft Ads Knowledge: You understand why Bing is crucial for IT-related emergencies.



Data-Driven: You don't just report on "clicks"; you report on "Cost per Lead" and "Quality Score".



Reliability: Since we are an emergency service, your communication must be top-notch.



To filter out automated applications, please follow these steps:



Start your application with the phrase: "M365 Search Intent Specialist found."



Briefly describe one B2B or IT campaign you have managed.



What is your strategy to avoid clicks from people looking for "free Microsoft support"?



What is your expected hourly rate for a part-time/on-call relationship?

title: Remote Primary Care Nurse (RN)
description:
About Mulberry Health



Mulberry Health is a forward-thinking healthcare provider dedicated to delivering exceptional primary care services remotely. We are committed to leveraging technology to provide accessible, high-quality care to our patients. We are expanding our team and looking for three dedicated and skilled nurses from the Philippines to join us in our mission.



Job Summary



We are seeking experienced and compassionate Remote Primary Care Nurses to provide comprehensive virtual nursing care and back-office support. The ideal candidates will be responsible for a combination of clinical and administrative tasks, ensuring our patients receive the best possible care and our operations run smoothly. This is a full-time, remote position for candidates based in the Philippines.



Key Responsibilities



Primary Care Nursing (70%):

- Conduct virtual patient consultations via phone and video to assess patient conditions, provide nursing care, and offer patient education.

- Monitor and document patient vital signs, symptoms, and health progress in the EMR system.

- Collaborate with a multidisciplinary team of physicians, specialists, and other healthcare professionals to coordinate patient care.

- Develop and implement individualized patient care plans.

- Assist patients with medication management and adherence.



MA Back-Office Responsibilities (30%):

- Manage patient appointments, including scheduling, rescheduling, and sending reminders.

- Handle administrative tasks such as processing medical billing, managing patient records, and ensuring data accuracy.

- Transcribe physician's notes and update patient charts in the EMR system.

- Assist with prior authorizations and other insurance-related tasks.



Required Qualifications:

- Active and unrestricted Registered Nurse (RN) license in the Philippines (PRC License).

- Minimum of 2 years of clinical experience in a hospital or primary care setting.

- Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.

- Reliable high-speed internet connection (minimum 150 Mbps) and a quiet, professional home office setup.

- Strong organizational skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work independently.



Preferred Qualifications:

- Previous experience in a remote nursing or telehealth role.

- Proficiency with EMR/EHR systems, with a strong preference for eClinicalWorks (ECW). Experience with Epic, Athena, or similar platforms is also valued.

- US Registered Nurse (USRN) license is a strong advantage but not required.

- BLS and/or ACLS certifications are highly desirable.



Compensation and Benefits:

- Competitive hourly rate: $5.00 - $8.00 USD per hour (commensurate with experience)

- 15 days paid time off (PTO) annually

- 10 paid US holidays

- Opportunities for ongoing training and career advancement



To Apply:

Please send your resume (PDF) and a short 1-2 minute video introduction to 
 with the subject line: "Application for Remote Primary Care Nurse - [Your Name]"

title: Content Producer
description:
ABOUT THE JOB

Are you a creative storyteller who knows how to turn ideas into engaging content that drives results? Penji is seeking a Content Producer to transform company initiatives, partnerships, and events into compelling content that captures attention and generates views. You'll take projects from the team—podcast episodes, event recordings, partner collaborations, campaign assets—& produce polished, engaging content optimized for maximum reach across platforms. This role demands both creative vision and technical execution: you need to understand what makes content shareable, how to hook viewers in the first 3 seconds, and how to repurpose one asset into multiple high-performing pieces. If you're obsessed with engagement metrics and love experimenting with formats that perform, apply to join Penji today.



ABOUT THE COMPANY

Since 2017, Penji has provided on-demand access to the top 2% of graphic designers. We're the leader in graphic design subscription services and have been recognized by Inc. Magazine as one of the fastest-growing companies.

Beyond our business success, we're a community-conscious startup dedicated to supporting nonprofits and those helping others. Graphic design is what we do. Being a responsible employer and supporting our communities is who we aim to be. Join us on our mission to leave a positive footprint.



QUALIFICATIONS

? 3+ years of content production experience with proven results driving views and engagement

? Portfolio demonstrating ability to create high-performing social media content (video clips, reels, shorts)

? Strong video editing skills (Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, CapCut, or similar)

? Understanding of platform-specific content optimization (YouTube, LinkedIn, Instagram, TikTok,
)

? Experience repurposing long-form content into multiple short-form assets

? Graphic design skills for thumbnails, quote graphics, and promotional materials

? Data-driven approach to content performance and willingness to iterate based on metrics

? Creative storytelling ability with understanding of hooks, pacing, and audience retention



RESPONSIBILITIES

? Content Production: Take raw materials (podcast recordings, event footage, interviews, presentations) and produce polished, engaging content optimized for each platform.

? Multi-Format Repurposing: Transform single pieces of content into multiple assets—video clips, reels, quote graphics, audiograms, blog snippets, social posts, and ad creatives.

? Engagement Optimization: Create content designed for maximum views using proven techniques—strong hooks, compelling thumbnails, platform-specific formats, and strategic editing.

? Video Editing: Edit podcast episodes, event recordings, and interviews into shareable clips with captions, graphics, b-roll, and engaging cuts.

? Graphic Design: Create eye-catching thumbnails, quote graphics, promotional images, and social media assets that drive clicks.

? Platform Strategy: Understand what works on each platform (YouTube vs. LinkedIn vs. Instagram) and adapt content accordingly.

? Performance Tracking: Monitor content performance metrics (views, engagement, watch time, click-through rates) and identify what's working.

? Experimentation: Continuously test new content formats, editing styles, thumbnail approaches, and distribution strategies to improve results.

? Content Calendar Management: Coordinate content production schedule to align with events, campaigns, and partnership initiatives.

? Trend Awareness: Stay current on content trends, viral formats, and platform algorithm changes to keep content relevant and discoverable.

? Quality Control: Ensure all content meets brand standards while remaining authentic and engaging.

? Collaboration: Work with partnerships, events, and marketing teams to understand content goals and align production with company objectives.

? Asset Library Management: Organize and maintain content library for easy repurposing and reference.

? Reporting: Provide regular reports on content performance, top-performing assets, and insights for future production.



HOW TO APPLY

Apply here:

Attach your portfolio or samples of relevant past work.

title: Research Assistant
description:
Research Assistant — Financial Markets Data Collection (Remote, Full-Time)



We're looking for a detail-oriented research assistant to support our futures markets research. This is structured, clearly defined work — not trading or analysis. You'll follow specific procedures to observe and record market events across multiple assets using TradingView and Google Sheets.



What the work looks like:

You'll review historical chart data on TradingView, identify specific price events based on criteria we define, capture screenshots, and log observations in a standardized Google Sheets format. Each research task comes with video training and clear written instructions. When the criteria change, you'll receive updated training.



Tools you'll use daily:

TradingView, Google Sheets, Google Drive, screenshot tool (ShareX or Windows Snipping Tool)



What we're looking for:



Strong attention to detail — our research depends on accuracy and consistency, every entry matters

Reliability and follow-through — deliver complete work on time, every week

Comfortable navigating TradingView or willing to learn quickly

Clean, organized approach to data entry

Responsive communication — we expect responses within 12 hours



Prior TradingView or financial charting experience is a plus but not required. What matters most is that you can follow detailed procedures precisely and maintain a high standard across repetitive tasks.



What we offer:



$1,000/month, full-time

Flexible schedule — we care about output quality, not when you work

Clear expectations and structured training for every task

Growth opportunity in both compensation and responsibility as trust is established



How to apply:

Begin your application with the word "charting." Tell us briefly about your experience with data entry or research work, and describe a time you had to maintain high accuracy over repetitive tasks. We'll start with a paid trial period that includes training materials and a defined research task.
